name: Pearl Izumi Sugar Jersey - Women's
description:
A fresh take on the classic short-sleeved jersey. Roll up for your next summer group ride in comfort and modern style. The soft fabric wicks moisture when your competitive streak comes out. You get the standard triple drop-in pocket in back, plus a bonus mesh pocket perfectly sized for a phone.100% recycled polyester is highly breathable with excellent moisture wicking.Full-length front zipper lets you vent on warmer rides.3 rear drop-in pockets hold your ride essentials.1 stretch mesh rear pocket is sized for a phone.BioViz® reflective details.Slim fit.

        Sustainability
